Project Document Microinsurance - Final without budget.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
Capacity Development for the Micro-insurance market project: 
To enhance capacity of the Government and disadvantaged groups to mitigate economic and social vulnerabilities by developing and introducing the market-based micro-insurance in Mongolia.

project_descr:
Capacity Development of the Micro-insurance Market Project: 
The project aims to enhance capacity of the Government and disadvantaged groups to mitigate economic and social vulnerabilities by developing and introducing market-based micro-insurance.
